title: Glottography dataset derived from Bowern and Atkinson 2012 "Computational phylogenetics and the internal structure of Pama-Nyungan"
description: The dataset provides non-overlapping speaker areas for major current subgroups of Pama-Nyungan derived from Figure 1 in Bowern and Atkinson 2012.
citation: Bowern, Claire & Quentin Atkinson. 2012. Computational phylogenetics and the internal structure of Pama-Nyungan. Language 88. 817-845. doi: 10.2307/23357554.
